document.full_text: without jason bay, who is on baseball's new paternity leave list, the mets wasted a three-run lead, then botched a golden opportunity in the ninth inning.
document.title: giants 7, mets 6 (10 innings): the mets, short-handed from the start, fall at the end
lines_and_colors: without jason bay, who is on baseball's new paternity leave list, the mets wasted a three-run lead, then botched a golden opportunity in the ninth inning.
